Mezzo::SeqBlockSummary::SeqBlockSummary (  Buffer  samples  ) 
 

Mezzo::SeqBlockSummary::SeqBlockSummary (  SeqBlockMetadata *  metadata  ) 
 

Create from packed summary data that had been previously saved from GetPackedData. Also needs to know the number of samples in the original block in order to load correctly.
